languages.text: Многочисленные тела устилают землю. Некоторые трупы изуродованы с особой жестокостью, других же убивали быстро, почти мимоходом.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Повсюду следы паники и кучи трупов гвардейцев. Попытка контратаковать дворец обернулась огромными потерями

languages.text: Numerous bodies litter the ground. Some corpses were mutilated with particular cruelty while others were killed quickly, almost in passing.
languages.original_text: Многочисленные тела устилают землю. Некоторые трупы изуродованы с особой жестокостью, других же убивали быстро, почти мимоходом.

traits.locale_text: Numerous bodies litter the ground. Some corpses were mutilated with particular cruelty while others were killed quickly, almost in passing.
Numerous bodies litter the ground. Some corpses were mutilated with particular cruelty while others were killed quickly, almost in passing.
Numerous bodies litter the ground. Some corpses were mutilated with particular cruelty while others were killed quickly, almost in passing.
Numerous bodies litter the ground. Some corpses were mutilated with particular cruelty while others were killed quickly, almost in passing.
Numerous bodies litter the ground. Some corpses were mutilated with particular cruelty while others were killed quickly, almost in passing.

languages.text: 无数尸体散落在地上。其中一部分被极其残忍地肢解，而另一部分则被迅速杀死，几乎是一击毙命。
languages.original_text: Numerous bodies litter the ground. Some corpses were mutilated with particular cruelty while others were killed quickly, almost in passing.

traits.locale_text: 无数尸体散落在地上。其中一部分被极其残忍地肢解，而另一部分则被迅速杀死，几乎是一击毙命。

languages.text: El suelo está lleno de cadáveres. Algunos de los cuerpos han sido mutilados cruentamente, mientras que otros han muerto rápidamente, como de pasada.
languages.original_text: Numerous bodies litter the ground. Some corpses were mutilated with particular cruelty while others were killed quickly, almost in passing.

traits.locale_text: El suelo está lleno de cadáveres. Algunos de los cuerpos han sido mutilados cruentamente, mientras que otros han muerto rápidamente, como de pasada.

languages.text: 地面には無数の死体が散らばっている。特別残酷に惨殺されたものもあれば、片手間に殺されたようなものもある。
languages.original_text: Numerous bodies litter the ground. Some corpses were mutilated with particular cruelty while others were killed quickly, almost in passing.

traits.locale_text: 地面には無数の死体が散らばっている。特別残酷に惨殺されたものもあれば、片手間に殺されたようなものもある。

languages.text: Zahlreiche Leichen liegen verstreut auf dem Boden. Einige Körper wurden mit besonderer Grausamkeit verstümmelt, andere wurden rasch, fast beiläufig getötet.
languages.original_text: Numerous bodies litter the ground. Some corpses were mutilated with particular cruelty while others were killed quickly, almost in passing.

traits.locale_text: Zahlreiche Leichen liegen verstreut auf dem Boden. Einige Körper wurden mit besonderer Grausamkeit verstümmelt, andere wurden rasch, fast beiläufig getötet.

languages.text: De nombreux cadavres jonchent le sol. Certains cadavres ont été mutilés avec une cruauté toute particulière, tandis que d'autres ont été tués rapidement, comme sans y prêter attention.
languages.original_text: Numerous bodies litter the ground. Some corpses were mutilated with particular cruelty while others were killed quickly, almost in passing.

traits.locale_text: De nombreux cadavres jonchent le sol. Certains cadavres ont été mutilés avec une cruauté toute particulière, tandis que d'autres ont été tués rapidement, comme sans y prêter attention.

languages.text: Yer, sayısız cesetle dolu. Bazı cesetlere özenle zulmedilmiş, bazılarıysa âdeta yoldan geçerken hızlıca öldürülmüş.
languages.original_text: Numerous bodies litter the ground. Some corpses were mutilated with particular cruelty while others were killed quickly, almost in passing.

traits.locale_text: Yer, sayısız cesetle dolu. Bazı cesetlere özenle zulmedilmiş, bazılarıysa âdeta yoldan geçerken hızlıca öldürülmüş.
